text.highlights_panel_helper: Double-click to edit. Drag to reorder (in Simple Mode).
text.dialog_save_prompt_text:
You have unsaved changes in '{filename}'.

Would you like to save them before closing?
text.dialog_edit_file_text:
To edit this file externally, you first need to save it. This new file will include all your current highlights marked with ==...== syntax.

Your external editor will then open this new file. Any changes you save will be automatically reloaded in Slothy Marker.
text.dialog_remove_all_text:
Are you sure you want to remove all highlights?
This action will be added to the undo history.
text.status_file_reloaded: File reloaded due to external changes.
text.external_edit_header:
<!--- Slothy Marker Helper ---
This file was saved for external editing. Slothy Marker uses a simple syntax to find your highlights.

- Text wrapped in double equal signs, like ==this==, will become a highlight.
- You can create your own highlights by adding them here!
- This entire comment block will be invisible inside the app.
-->
text.error_multiple_tags: This file contains multiple format tags. Please ensure only one tag is present on the first line.
